name: Backyard Battlin' Bugs
description:
Backyard Battlin' Bugs is a game where you must pit your own ants, beetles, and wasps against an attacking nest! You take the role of a snot-nosed dirt eatin' kid who has an affinity for bugs, and they are being attacked by a neighboring nest. You must send your bugs against their aggressors until one nest comes out on top!

Backyard Battlin' Bugs is an RTS style game developed for android where the bugs fight each other. To play: Download the APK file, locate it on your mobile device, install it and run. Swipe/pinch controls to move the camera and buttons to spawn bugs.

This is a personal project solo developed by me.
